description: Continued fraction expansion of limit_{m->infinity} [r_m], where r_1=1, r_{m+1}= r_1 + 1/(r_2 + 1/(r_3 +...1/(r_{m-1} + 1/r_m)...)).
mathematica: digits = 100; Clear[r]; r[1]=1; r[m_] := r[m] = FromContinuedFraction[Array[r, m-1]] // N[#, 2*digits]&; k=20; While[ContinuedFraction[r[k], digits] != ContinuedFraction[r[k-1], digits], k++; Print["k = ", k]]; ContinuedFraction[r[k], digits] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 11 2014 *)
author: _Leroy Quet_, Apr 02 2000
extensions: More terms from _Jeppe Stig Nielsen_, Apr 13 2000
